sourcesContent:
import { useState } from 'react'; import classes from './Form.module.css' export default function FormPage() { const [userInput,set] = useState({ 'current-savings': 0, 'yearly-contribution': 0, 'expected-return': 0, 'duration': 0 }); function submitHandler(event) { event.preventDefault(); console.log('Submit'); } function resetHandler() { console.log('RESET'); } function inputChangeHandler(input,value) { console.log(input, value) } return(

inputChangeHandler('current-savings', event.target.value) } type="number" id="current-savings" />

inputChangeHandler('yearly-contribution', event.target.value) } type="number" id="yearly-contribution"/>

inputChangeHandler('expected-return', event.target.value) } type="number" id="expected-return" />

inputChangeHandler('duration', event.target.value) } type="number" id="duration" />

) }
